How many people are affected by hyperferritinemia-cataract syndrome ?,"Hyperferritinemia-cataract syndrome has been estimated to occur in 1 in 200,000 individuals.",GHR,hyperferritinemia-cataract syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to hyperferritinemia-cataract syndrome ?,"Hyperferritinemia-cataract syndrome is caused by mutations in the FTL gene. This gene provides instructions for making the ferritin light chain
